Synopsis:
---------
All That Jazz, All That Jazz is a semi-autobiography of the famous writer, director and choreographer Bob Fosse. Winner of an Oscar, a Tony and a Emi, took home a total of 8 renowned awards. Part tragic, part comic this movie gives us a glimpse of the life of Bob Fosse. Portrays the harshness, the splendor and decadence of the people working in the entertainment world, whose desire for victory denied the possibility of other affections.
